product_description.basic_use: Formulated cementitious material for masonry mortars in scratch, brown, and finish coat applications.
product_description.composition_and_materials: Portland cement, plasticizers, ground limestone, and air entraining additives.
benefits: Provides excellent board life, water retention, compressive strength, durability, and finished appearance

physical_chemical_properties: Manufactured to meet ASTM C1328 requirements for a Type S cement
Complies with applicable plaster mixes listed in Table 1 of ASTM C926
Facilitates easy application and texturing for architectural finishes

installation.preparatory_work: Mix according to ASTM C926. Machine mixing recommended.
mixing_instructions: Use 1 bag Custom Stucco to the appropriate aggregate volume listed in Table 2 or 3 in ASTM C926; use sand conforming to ASTM C897
Add approximately 3/4 of the desired volume of mix water, then add 1/2 the sand and then 1 bag of Custom Stucco to the mixer
Add the rest of the sand and remaining mix water to achieve desired workability and color
Mix for 3-5 minutes after all materials are in the mixer
precautions: Re-tempering should be done only once
Discard stucco after 1-12 hours if not used
installation.safety: Avoid direct contact with skin. If contact occurs, wash with water. Exposure can cause chemical burns. Flush eyes with water if contact occurs and seek medical attention.
